publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-236 Malcolm Chisholm: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (Scotland) (No.3) Order 2003â€”That the Health Committee recommends that the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (Scotland) (No.3) Order 2003 (SSI 2003/365) be approved.
